patthana19.7:1.1: Napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.
patthana19.7:2.1: Nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.
patthana19.7:3.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
